document_title: Penile cancer: Causes, signs, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_content:
If the cancer is in its early stages, treatment may include:
The medicine is in the form of a skin cream; Cryotherapy, a procedure that uses extremely cold liquid or a device to freeze and destroy cancerous tissue; Mohs surgery removes affected skin layer by layer until healthy tissue is reached; Laser to cut and destroy cancerous areas; Circumcision surgery if cancer is only on the foreskin
subsection_title: ung thu duong vat.json. Penile cancer treatment
